textdata.text:
HALK GONZO BARBARIAN
M ACFKAEOOAAMM ENFCEIEDENEIED GGCCCCCCCCCCCCCC

GRYNIX
ERNUM QUEY KI SKEBOW REDNIM U OS DEY WEFNA ENOCARN AQUANTANA
LAUNCH IT CATCH IT SNATCH IT

N W E S C B B AOC
A
NONE SHALL PASS THE CORRIDOR OF FIRE
HOLY ONE STEP FORWARD WITH PURPOSE AND TRUST THAT I WILL GUIDE _YOUTHROUGH _THEPURGATORY THAT AWAITS.
THANK _YOUYET AGAIN MY BRAVE FRIENDS. CHAOS AND HIS PLAN HAVE BEEN DEFEATED.
